name: Employee Retention Credit
description: Federal tax credit encouraging businesses to retain employees during the COVID-19 pandemic
ui_questions: How many W-2 employees do you have?
What was your revenue decline compared to the previous year?

human_summary: Payroll tax credit for businesses that kept employees on payroll during COVID-19
